data.title: October weather
data.meta_description: October weather for Yorkton, Canada: October, the same as September, in Yorkton, Canada, is a frosty autumn month, with an average temperature fluctuating between 1.5°C (34.7°F) and 8.5°C (47.3°F). In Yorkton, during October, snow falls for 5.8 days and regularly aggregates up to 48mm (1.89") of snow.
data.text:
Average temperature in October

Yorkton, Canada

Average high temperature in October: 8.5°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (24.1°C).

The months with the lowest average high temperature are January and February (-10.7°C).

Average low temperature in October: 1.5°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (12.8°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (-18.8°C).

Average snowfall days in October

Yorkton, Canada

Average snowfall days in October: 5.8 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is March (15.3 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July and August (0 days).

Average daylight in October /

Average sunshine in October

Yorkton, Canada

Average daylight in October: 10h and 4min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 16h and 30min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 0min).

Average sunshine in October: 5h and 4min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 11h and 6min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 2h and 54min).

Average UV index in October

Yorkton, Canada

Average UV index in October: 2

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 5).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, November and December (UV index 1).
